body:
### About Me I am a 3rd year Computer Science student at BITS-Pilani, Goa Campus. I am currently pursuing research in Machine Learning with a focus on NLP, Computer Vision and Deep RL. ### Contact Me My e-mail is arkil[dot]patel[at]gmail[dot]com / f20160665[at]goa[dot]bits-pilani[dot]ac[dot]in
Find me on [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/arkil-patel-180922144)
